summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1681, for the improvement of East 65th Street, form 17th Avenue Northeast to 22nd Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by laying water mains therein; together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 17704 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
